data.content:
noun
plural ~ lodes
[count] chiefly US :the place where the largest amount of gold, silver, etc., in a particular area can be found - usually singular
a gold miner who struck/hit the mother lode [=who found the place containing the largest amount of gold] - often used figuratively
The library's collection of old newspapers has proven to be a mother lode of information about the town's early history.
